/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The road itself is divided by a median, with trees lining both sides, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the iconic Temple of Heaven can be seen, its distinctive architecture standing out against the skyline. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the temple and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a detailed and vivid depiction of a day in the life of this bustling city.
